author: sendmoodz
content:
<@456226577798135808> <@!425279588009246720> <@!211091239112671234>  thoughts on pricing of TLOAD/TSTORE? i want to get the EIP to CFI, which I think means I need to resolve the gas cost story. should the gas costs be dynamic? or is it ok for TSTORE/TLOAD  to have the same schedule as warm SLOAD/SSTORE, in which case, TSTORE can be used to allocate significantly more memory than MSTORE (~20MB for a 30m gas block)?
any context on how memory pricing was derived would be very helpful
